import React from 'react' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' export default class Login extends React.Component { state = { name: "", email: "", password: "" } handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({[event.target.name]: event.target.value}) } returnLogin = (event) => { this.props.loginUser(this.state) } render() { return(
Full Name: Email: Email address is used for login Password: Password is encripted using Bcrypt GEM
) } }
